aboutLucas: I am Lucas, I graduated in Internet Systems Technology from the Federal Institute of São Paulo (IFSP São João da Boa Vista). I am passionate about Front End, with expertise in Vue.js 3.
description: Hello, I'm Lucas, a Front-End web development enthusiast and passionate about creating engaging and functional digital experiences. Specialized in the Vue.js ecosystem, I am constantly seeking to enhance my skills and explore new possibilities in the creation of interactive and responsive interfaces.
axios: API Integration for Providing Dynamic Data
course: Bachelor of Technology in Internet Systems
institute: Federal Institute of São Joao da Boa Vista - SP
aboutLucasSub: Receiving feedback is always very welcome. I value teamwork collaboration, showing concern to support those who are starting out, as I have experienced this phase myself and understand the initial challenges. I have the habit of offering suggestions and expressing my point of view regarding improvement opportunities, allowing me to share my knowledge and gain new insights with the group.
experience: Experience as a Frontend/Fullstack Developer, using tools like Vue.js and Laravel (PHP) to design interfaces for B2B solutions. Active collaboration in an agile team, prioritizing the achievement of measurable results.

conclusion: English course completion using the Callan Method at Institute USK Callan Method at Poços de Caldas - MG
